verses.verse: The hand <WH3027> of the LORD <WH3068> was on me, and carried <WH3318> me out in the spirit <WH7307> of the LORD, <WH3068> and set <WH5117> me down in the middle <WH8432> of the valley <WH1237> which <WH1958> was full <WH4392> of bones, <WH6106>

And caused me to pass <WH5674> by them round <WH5439> about: and, behold, <WH2009> there were very <WH3966> many <WH7227> in the open <WH6440> valley; <WH1237> and, see, <WH2009> they were very <WH3966> dry. <WH3002>
And he said <WH559> to me, Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> can these <WH428> bones <WH6106> live? <WH2421> And I answered, <WH559> O Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> you know. <WH3045>
Again he said <WH559> to me, Prophesy <WH5012> on these <WH428> bones, <WH6106> and say <WH559> to them, O you dry <WH3002> bones, <WH6106> hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the LORD. <WH3068>
Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069> to these <WH428> bones; <WH6106> Behold, <WH2009> I will cause breath <WH7307> to enter <WH935> into you, and you shall live: <WH2421>

And I will lay <WH5414> sinews <WH1517> on you, and will bring <WH5927> up flesh <WH1320> on you, and cover <WH7159> you with skin, <WH5785> and put <WH5414> breath <WH7307> in you, and you shall live; <WH2421> and you shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD. <WH3068>

So I prophesied <WH5012> as I was commanded: <WH6680> and as I prophesied, <WH5012> there was a noise, <WH6963> and behold <WH2009> a shaking, <WH7494> and the bones <WH6106> came <WH7126> together, bone <WH6106> to his bone. <WH6106>

And when I beheld, <WH7200> see, <WH2009> the sinews <WH1517> and the flesh <WH1320> came <WH5927> up on them, and the skin <WH5785> covered <WH7159> them above: <WH4605> but there was no <WH369> breath <WH7307> in them.

Then said <WH559> he to me, Prophesy <WH5012> to the wind, <WH7307> prophesy, <WH5012> son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> and say <WH559> to the wind, <WH7307> Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Come <WH935> from the four <WH702> winds, <WH7307> O breath, <WH7307> and breathe <WH5301> on these <WH428> slain, <WH2026> that they may live. <WH2421>

So I prophesied <WH5012> as he commanded <WH6680> me, and the breath <WH7307> came <WH935> into them, and they lived, <WH2421> and stood <WH5975> up on their feet, <WH7272> an exceeding <WH3966> great <WH1419> army. <WH2428>

Then he said <WH559> to me, Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> these <WH428> bones <WH6106> are the whole <WH3605> house <WH1004> of Israel: <WH3478> behold, <WH2009> they say, <WH559> Our bones <WH6106> are dried, <WH3001> and our hope <WH8615> is lost: <WH6> we are cut <WH1504> off for our parts.

Therefore <WH3651> prophesy <WH5012> and say <WH559> to them, Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Behold, <WH2009> O my people, <WH5971> I will open <WH6605> your graves, <WH6913> and cause you to come <WH5927> up out of your graves, <WH6913> and bring <WH935> you into <WH413> the land <WH127> of Israel. <WH3478>
And you shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD, <WH3068> when I have opened <WH6605> your graves, <WH6913> O my people, <WH5971> and brought <WH5927> you up out of your graves, <WH6913>

And shall put <WH5414> my spirit <WH7307> in you, and you shall live, <WH2421> and I shall place <WH3241> you in your own land: <WH127> then shall you know <WH3045> that I the LORD <WH3068> have spoken <WH1696> it, and performed <WH6213> it, said <WH5002> the LORD. <WH136>
The word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> again to me, saying, <WH559>

Moreover, you son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> take <WH3947> you one <WH259> stick, <WH6086> and write <WH3789> on it, For Judah, <WH3063> and for the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> his companions: <WH2270> then take <WH3947> another <WH259> stick, <WH6086> and write <WH3789> on it, For Joseph, <WH3130> the stick <WH6086> of Ephraim <WH669>and for all <WH3605> the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> his companions: <WH2270>
And join <WH7126> them one <WH259> to another <WH259> into one <WH259> stick; <WH6086> and they shall become <WH1961> one <WH259> in your hand. <WH3027>
And when <WH3588> the children <WH1121> of your people <WH5971> shall speak <WH559> to you, saying, <WH559> Will you not show <WH5046> us what <WH4100> you mean by these? <WH428>

Say <WH1696> to them, Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Behold, <WH2009> I will take <WH3947> the stick <WH6086> of Joseph, <WH3130> which <WH834> is in the hand <WH3027> of Ephraim, <WH669> and the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478> his fellows, <WH2270> and will put <WH5414> them with him, even <WH853> with the stick <WH6086> of Judah, <WH3063> and make <WH6213> them one <WH259> stick, <WH6086> and they shall be one <WH259> in my hand. <WH3027>
And the sticks <WH6086> where on <WH834> <WH5921> you write <WH3789> shall be in your hand <WH3027> before their eyes. <WH5869>

And say <WH1696> to them, Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Behold, <WH2009> I will take <WH3947> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> from among <WH996> the heathen, <WH1471> where <WH834> <WH8033> they be gone, <WH1980> and will gather <WH6908> them on every <WH5437> side, <WH5439> and bring <WH935> them into <WH413> their own land: <WH127>

And I will make <WH6213> them one <WH259> nation <WH1471> in the land <WH776> on the mountains <WH2022> of Israel; <WH3478> and one <WH259> king <WH4428> shall be king <WH4428> to them all: <WH3605> and they shall be no <WH3808> more <WH5750> two <WH8147> nations, <WH1471> neither <WH3808> shall they be divided <WH2673> into two <WH8147> kingdoms <WH4467> any more <WH5750> at all.

Neither <WH3808> shall they defile <WH2930> themselves any more <WH5750> with their idols, <WH1544> nor with their detestable <WH8251> things, nor with any <WH3605> of their transgressions: <WH6588> but I will save <WH3467> them out of all <WH3605> their dwelling places, <WH4186> wherein <WH834> they have sinned, <WH2398> and will cleanse <WH2891> them: so shall they be my people, <WH5971> and I will be their God. <WH430>

And David <WH1732> my servant <WH5650> shall be king <WH4428> over <WH5921> them; and they all <WH3605> shall have <WH1961> one <WH259> shepherd: <WH7462> they shall also walk <WH3212> in my judgments, <WH4941> and observe <WH8104> my statutes, <WH2708> and do <WH6213> them.

And they shall dwell <WH3427> in the land <WH776> that I have given <WH5414> to Jacob <WH3290> my servant, <WH5650> wherein <WH834> your fathers <WH1> have dwelled; <WH3427> and they shall dwell <WH3427> therein, even they, and their children, <WH1121> and their children's <WH1121> children <WH1121> for ever: <WH5769> and my servant <WH5650> David <WH1732> shall be their prince <WH5387> for ever. <WH5769>

Moreover I will make <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> of peace <WH7965> with them; it shall be an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285> with them: and I will place <WH5414> them, and multiply <WH7235> them, and will set <WH5414> my sanctuary <WH4720> in the middle <WH8432> of them for ever more. <WH5769>
My tabernacle <WH4908> also shall be with them: yes, I will be their God, <WH430> and they shall be my people. <WH5971>
And the heathen <WH1471> shall know <WH3045> that I the LORD <WH3068> do sanctify <WH6942> Israel, <WH3478> when my sanctuary <WH4720> shall be in the middle <WH8432> of them for ever more. <WH5769>
